entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
